text: (ai yahood) kya tum us vakt maujood the jab yaakoob ke sar par maut aa khadee hueeus vakt unhonne apane beton se kaha ki mere baad kisee kee ibaadat karoge kahane lage ham aap ke maabood aur aap ke baap daadaon ibaraaheem va ismail va isahaaq ke maabood va yakata khuda kee ibaadat karenge aur ham usake pharamaabaradaar hain
